title: Elder Island (band)
text:
Elder Island is a British musical group from <a href="Bristol">Bristol</a>.
The group was founded under the name "Trouvaille", and was initially conceived as an experimental folk exploration whilst studying various art degrees in Bristol & South Wales. Their <a href="house%20music">house</a>-inflected 2014 debut received airplay on <a href="BBC%20Radio%206">BBC Radio 6</a>. The group continued working in jobs outside of the band alongside recording and producing side work included interior decoration, club management, graphic design, and art department work at <a href="Aardman%20Animations">Aardman Animations</a>.
Elder Island's first full-length, "The Omnitone Collection", was released in 2019. The group toured North America in 2019 in support of the album.
In November 2020, the group announced a new release, "Feral".
